mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_info AS a WHERE a.email = #{email}

UPDATE user_info SET
username = #{username},
name_pinyin = #{namePinyin},
english_name = #{englishName},
password = #{password},
pic = #{pic},
phone = #{phone},
graduated_school = #{graduatedSchool},
education = #{education},
academic_degree = #{academicDegree},
incumbency_information = #{incumbencyInformation},
company = #{company},
position1 = #{position1},
main_posts = #{mainPosts},
other_posts = #{otherPosts},
updated = #{updated} WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT a.id, a.email, a.username, a.name_pinyin, a.pic, a.english_name, a.gender, a.phone, a.graduated_school, a.education, a.academic_degree, a.main_posts, a.company, a.position1, a.other_posts, a.incumbency_information FROM user_info AS a
OR a.name_pinyin LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{namePinyin},'%')
OR a.english_name LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{englishName},'%')
OR a.username LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{username},'%')
OR a.academic_degree LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{academicDegree},'%')
OR a.main_posts LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{mainPosts},'%')
